name: James Barr
text: What can I say but we all know why we're here. They're 5.99 pizza deal is only comparable to frozen pizzas from the market. Only difference is you wait for one and tip a driver, the other you be yourself. Save the $3 and make it an event at home with pizza stones or cast iron deep skillets!

name: Yazmine58
text: If I could give them no stars for how disgusting they are  I would . I Found a hair in my pizza, highly upset with the cleanliness of my order. the hair was baked into my pizza that when I bit into it I pulled the hair string out of my ‚Ä¶More

name: kathryn loch
text: The pizza was so thin. I ordered extra sauce but it was barely on the pizza. Pizza was super dry even though I got it early. Terrible. Frozen pizzas are better

text: While order was delivered quickly, part of the order was missing. Tried calling multiple times to no avail. Kept getting same message stating store was closed at this time. Absolutely no way to get a hold of an employee. Paid for dinner for my family but NEVER received the entire order

name: Derek Ellerd
text: I would recommend either Dominos or Papa Johns over this location. They cannot deliver across all of Fort Carson which others can. Apparently the on post hotel is to far for them to deliver to which is 1.7 miles away...

text: Great pizza and fast delivery. Perfect for those I just want to stay in but also don't want to cook nights, especially when the kids can't decide what they actually want to eat for dinner.

name: Sarah Duke
text: We ordered pizza earlier tonight and when I bit into one slice i took the pizza out and there was a long light hair baked into the pizza. I, honestly, had the hair in my mouth at one point. We called and the manager offered us a $15 credit ‚Ä¶More

name: Master Giff
text: Pizza was good. Staff was friendly. $5 for personal pan pizza and a 20 oz. Drink for lunch.

name: Matt Settle
text: Came in at 4:30, no one didn‚Äôt even acknowledge me being there. Waiting 10 minuets and still didn‚Äôt no one came to place my order. Need to get priorities in check.

name: Cheryl Gonzales
text: Facility was super clean, staff authentically happy to help, order was out within 15 minutes and pizza's were fully loaded with nummy toppings. It is worth going on post just to order from them.

name: Amy Velis
text: The crew is amazing!! I am glad I go here, the best one I've been to in a very long time. Whenever there is a problem with my food they are willing to help not just forcing themselves to be decent workers. They genuinely want us to be happy with their food so that we will come back!!

name: pato andaracua
text: Staff cancelled my order without notifying me for no reason

text: Dont get the wings mine were over cooked and crunchy and the sauce wasnt even spicy it was just overly salty

name: Steven Haltz
text: Awesome place! Got my order right and to me on time. People over the phone were kind and offered me coupons I didn't know about. Stephanie also offered great customer service, she was very cheerful when delivering my pizza. Will order again.

name: Brandon Pack
text: Ordered two stuff crust pizzas. Only one showed up right. When we called the manager argued that we didn‚Äôt order two stuff crust pizzas but wouldn‚Äôt let me bring in proof of what the order said.

text: Like usually the website doesn‚Äôt match store prices and paid double from what I expected. Arron the manager said there was nothing he could do, he was respectful but not willing to legally honor the promotion items.

name: Sun Burnt

name: Matt P
text: Amazing!!! Best pizza hut. Food comes made right...& hot. Fast delivery. NATHANIEL was fabulous!!!!! Nice and patient great customer service treated us very nice and we are very happy customers :-) thank you our pizza was fresh YUMMY!

name: Nathaniel Stockwell
text:
I love this place! I definitely order more than once a week, and the place is very fast and efficient!
The staff is very friendly, and the quality of the food is very high! I would definitely recommend this place to anyone.

name: Titus Wilson
text: Whoever made the pizza has blessed hands. Highly recommend this place. Everyone there seemed very happy to be there.

name: Rachel Peden
text: So impressed with this location! We just moved to the area and were kind of bummed when an order of breadsticks was forgotten on our order. (With little kids it's the small stuff that counts) We called the store and the manager was courteous and had a new order sent out to our house within 10 minutes.
